body:
Replace intel-oneapi-compilers with intel-oneapi-cpp and intel-oneapi-fortran. Setup the runtime environment using the setvars instead of manually setting variables. Compilers were coming from hpckit, now they are installed from the standalones. This addresses the following issues:

* FPGA emulation support and dev-utilities (includes dpc_common.hpp) were missing
* environment was not fully setup for people using spack load
* compiler standalones are released more often than hpckit and could not be installed with intel-oneapi-compilers

addresses:
#21724 
#21698 

Please review: @frankwillmore @glennpj @scheibelp
title: oneapi compilers
